input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Beverage Air 501-137B Evaporator Motor .2 Amps 115-60 BOM

Item keywords:
Genuine OEM replacement part

Beverage Air offers industry leading quality in commercial refrigeration equipment designed for the food service industry

Use genuine OEM parts for safety reliability and performance

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This evaporator motor from Beverage Air is a genuine OEM replacement part designed for use with specific models of commercial refrigeration equipment. It is 0.2 amps and 115-60 BOM. This motor is a vital component of the refrigeration system, responsible for circulating refrigerant and cooling the air inside the cabinet. It is important to use genuine OEM parts for safety, reliability, and performance.
input_text.Response B: I do not have enough information to write a product description. Please provide more details about the product and its features.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback:
The language (and structuring) from response A is what I would consider to be within the realm of what modern-day 8th / 9th graders may readily apprehend.
The preceding sentence I wrote, indeed, likely is more complex than what AI writ.

So, I can't justify giving "A" a『3.』
